description:
Kannagi`s Zokusho, Ohika, has saved Arata after he collapsed during the party`s travels. Shortly after, Akachi of the Twelve Shinsho arrives and orders Ohika to become his Zokusho. Ohika refuses as he has sworn his loyalty to Kannagi, but Akachi isn`t content with taking no for an answer. And when Arata overhears Akachi`s words...
Source: crunchyroll
